trans-unit.source: Here is the code of your voucher:
Simply copy/paste this code during the payment process for your next order.
trans-unit.target: Jednostavno kopiraj/zalepi ovaj kod u toku procesa plaćanja sledeće narudžbine.

trans-unit.source: We have created a voucher in your name for referring a friend.
trans-unit.target: Imamo spremljen vaučer u vaše ime za preporuku prijatelja.

trans-unit.source: You can review your order and download your invoice from the "Order history" section of your customer account by clicking "My account" on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Možete napisati utiske o narudžbini i preuzeti vaš račun iz sekcije "Istorija narudžbi" na vašem nalogu, klikom na "Moj nalog" u našoj prodavnici.

trans-unit.source: If you have a guest account, you can follow your order via the "Guest Tracking" section on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Ako imate gostujući nalog, možete pratiti vašu narudžbinu putem sekcije "Praćenje gosta" u našoj radnji.

trans-unit.source: There is a problem with your payment for {shop_name} order with the reference {order_name}. Please contact us at your earliest convenience.
trans-unit.target: Iskrsao je problem sa plaćanjem za {shop_name} narudžbinu sa referencom {order_name}. Kontaktirajte nas što je pre moguće.

trans-unit.source: We cannot ship your order until we receive your payment.
trans-unit.target: Ne možemo isporučiti vašu porudžbinu dok ne primimo novac.

trans-unit.source: Here is your personal login information for {shop_name}:
trans-unit.target: Ovde je vaša informacija za prijavljivanje u {shop_name}:
Vaši novi detalji za prijavljivanje na {shop_name}

trans-unit.source: We have processed your {shop_name} refund for order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Obradili smo vašu {shop_name} vraćanje novca za narudžbinu sa referencom {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: Your guest account for {shop_name} has been transformed into a customer account.
trans-unit.target: Vaš gostujući nalog za {shop_name} je prebačen u korisnički nalog.

trans-unit.source: Please be careful when sharing these login details with others.
trans-unit.target: Oprezno sa deljenjem ovih detalja prijavljivanja sa ostalima.

trans-unit.source: You can access your customer account on our shop:
trans-unit.target: Možete pristupiti kupčevom nalogu u našoj radnji:

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name} has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: Vaša porudžbina sa napomenom {order_name} from {shop_name} je otkazana.

trans-unit.source: You have received a new log alert
Warning: you have received a new log alert in your Back Office.
trans-unit.target: Upozorenje: primili ste novi zapis upozorenja u vašem Back Office-u.

trans-unit.source: Your message has been sent successfully.
We will answer as soon as possible.
Regarding your newsletter subscription, we are pleased to offer you the following voucher:
trans-unit.target: S' obzirom na vašu prijavu na bilten, drago nam je što vam možemo ponuditi ovaj vaučer:

trans-unit.source: The remaining stock is now less than the specified minimum of
trans-unit.target: Preostale zalihe su manje od predviđenog minimuma od

trans-unit.source: You are advised to open the product's admin Product Page in order to replenish your inventory.
trans-unit.target: Savetujemo vam da otvorite administratorsku stranicu proizvoda kako bi ste napunili vaš invertar.
Hvala vam što kupujete u {shop_name} online prodavnici!

trans-unit.source: You have selected to pay by wire transfer.
Here are the bank details for your transfer:
trans-unit.target: Ovde su detalji banke za vaš prenos:

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} has been placed successfully and will be shipped as soon as we receive your payment.
trans-unit.target: Vaša narudžbina sa referencom {order_name} je uspešno postavljena, a biće isporučena čim dobijemo vašu uplatu.

trans-unit.source: If you have a guest account, you can follow your order via the "Guest Tracking" section on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Ako imate gostojući nalog, možete pratiti vašu narudžbinu putem sekcije "Praćenje gosta" u našoj prodavnici.

trans-unit.source: You have selected to pay by check.
Here are the bank details for your check:
trans-unit.target: Ovde su detalji banke za vaš ček:

trans-unit.source: We have generated a credit slip in your name for order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Izračunali smo kreditni odsečak u vašem nazivu za narudžbinu sa referencom {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: You can review this credit slip and download your invoice from the "My credit slips" section of your account by clicking "My account" on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Možete opisati ovaj kreditni odsečak i preuzeti vaš račun iz sekcije "Moji kreditni odsečci" vašeg naloga, klikom na "Moj nalog" u našoj prodavnici.

trans-unit.source: This is to inform you about the creation of a voucher.
trans-unit.target: Ovo vas informiše o kreiranju vaučera.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for creating a customer account at {shop_name}.
trans-unit.target: Hvala vam za kreiranje korisničkog naloga na {shop_name}.
Ovde su vaši detalji za prijavu:

trans-unit.source: Always keep your account details safe.
Never disclose your login details to anyone.
trans-unit.target: Nikada nikome ne otkrivajte detalje vaše prijave.

trans-unit.source: Should you suspect someone is using your account illegally, please notify us immediately.
trans-unit.target: Ako sumnjate da neko ilegalno koristi vaš nalog, odmah nas obavestite.

trans-unit.source: You can now place orders on our shop:
trans-unit.target: Sada možete da postavite narudžbine na našoj prodavnici:

trans-unit.source: We noticed that during your last visit on {shop_name}, you did not complete the order you had started.
trans-unit.target: Primetili smo da u toku vaše prošle posete na {shop_name}, niste završili započetu porudžbinu.

trans-unit.source: As an incentive, we can give you a discount of {amount}% off your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Kao podsticaj, dali smo vam popust od {amount}% na vašu sledeću porudžbinu! Ova ponuda je važeća {days} dana. Ne troši vreme uzaludno!

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} is currently in transit.
trans-unit.target: Vaša narudžbina sa preporukom od {order_name} je trenutno u tranzitu.

trans-unit.source: You can track your package using the following link:
trans-unit.target: Možete pratiti vaš paket koristeći ovaj link:

trans-unit.source: We have updated the progress on your return #{id_order_return}, the new status is:
trans-unit.target: Ažurirali smo napredak vašeg povraćaja #{id_order_return}, novi status je:

trans-unit.source: You have received a new message from {shop_name} regarding order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Primili ste novu poruku od from {shop_name} u vezi sa narudžbinom sa referncom {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: Your payment for order with the reference {order_name} was successfully processed.
trans-unit.target: Vaše plaćanje za porudžbinu sa referencom {order_name} je uspešno obrađeno.

trans-unit.source: You have requested to reset your {shop_name} login details.
trans-unit.target: Tražili ste promenu detalja prijavljivanja za {shop_name}.

trans-unit.source: Please note that this will change your current password.
trans-unit.target: Imajte u vidu da će ovo promeniti vašu trenutnu lozinku.

trans-unit.source: To confirm this action, please use the following link:
trans-unit.target: Za prihvatanje ove akcije, koristite sledeći link:

trans-unit.source:
This is a test e-mail from your shop.

If you can read this, the test was successful!
trans-unit.target:
Ovo je test mejl sa vaše prodavnice.

Ako vidite ovo, test je uspešan!

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} has been shipped.
trans-unit.target: Vaša porudžbina sa referencom {order_name} je isporučena.

trans-unit.source: A voucher has been created in your name as a result of your order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Vaučer je kreiran u vaše ime kao rezultat narudžbine sa referencom {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: A new order was placed on {shop_name} by the following customer: {firstname} {lastname} ({email})
trans-unit.target: Nova porudžbina je postavljena na {shop_name} od sledećeg kupca: {firstname} {lastname} ({email})

trans-unit.source: Please do not reply directly to this email, we will not receive it.
trans-unit.target: Molimo vas da ne odgovarate direktno na ovaj email, nećemo ga primiti.

trans-unit.source: In order to reply, please use the following link: {link}
trans-unit.target: Kako bi odgovorili, molimo vas da koristite sledeći link: {link}

trans-unit.source: You have received a new message regarding order with the reference
trans-unit.target: Primili ste novu poruku u vezi porudžbine sa referencom

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name}
trans-unit.target: Hvala za narudžbinu sa referencom {order_name} od {shop_name}

trans-unit.source: You have {nbProducts} product(s) now available for download using the following link(s):
trans-unit.target: Imate {nbProducts} prizvod(a) dostupnih za preuzimanje na sledećem linku (sledećim linkovima):

trans-unit.source: A new order has been generated on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: Nova narudžbina je generisana u vaše ime.

trans-unit.source: Please go on {order_link} to finalize the payment.
trans-unit.target: Idite na {order_link} da završite plaćanje.

trans-unit.source: We are currently processing your {shop_name} order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Trenutno obrađujemo vašu {shop_name} porudžbinu sa referencom {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: {employee} wanted to forward this discussion to you.
trans-unit.target: {employee} želi da vam prosledi ovu diskusiju.

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name} has been changed by the merchant.
trans-unit.target: Vaša porudžbina sa referencom {order_name} sa {shop_name} je izmenjena od strane prodavca.

trans-unit.source: Thanks for your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name}.
trans-unit.target: Hvala vam za porudžbinu sa referencom {order_name} sa {shop_name}.

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, one or more items are currently out of stock. This may cause a slight delay in your delivery. Please accept our apologies and rest assured that we are working hard to rectify this.
trans-unit.target: Nažalost, jedna ili više stavki su za sada rasprodate. Ovo može izazvati kašnjenje u isporuci. Prihvatite naše izvinjenje i budite uvereni da radimo na tome da ispravimo ovo.

trans-unit.source: Your cart has been saved, you can resume your order by visiting our shop:
trans-unit.target: Vaša korpa je sačuvana, možete nastaviti sa porudžbinom posetom naše prodavnice:

trans-unit.source: Enter this code in your shopping cart to get your discount.
trans-unit.target: Upišite ovaj kod u vašu korpu za dobijanje popusta.

trans-unit.source: You are one of our best customers, however you have not placed an order in {days_threshold} days.
trans-unit.target: Vi ste jedan od naših najboljih kupaca, čak i ako niste postavili porudžbinu {days_threshold} dana.

trans-unit.source: We wish to thank you for the trust you have placed in us and want to give you a discount of {amount}% valid on your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Želimo da vam se zahvalimo na poverenju koje ste nam ukazali i želimo da vam damo popust od {amount}% koji važi do vaše sledeće porudžbine! Ova ponuda važi {days} dana. Ne gubite vreme!

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your order at {shop_name}.
As our way of saying thanks, we want to give you a discount of {amount}% off your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Kako bi smo vam se zahvalili, dajemo vam popust od {amount}% na vašu sledeću porudžbinu! ova ponuda važi {days} dana. Ne trošite vreme uzaludno!

trans-unit.source: You are one of our best customers and as such we want to thank you for your continued patronage.
trans-unit.target: Vi ste jedan od naših najboljih kupaca i želimo davam se snažno zahvalimo na tome.

trans-unit.source: As appreciation for your loyalty, we want to give you a discount of {amount}% valid on your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Kao znak zahvalnosti za vernost , želimo da vam damo popust od {amount}% koji važi do vaše sledeće porudžbine! Ova ponuda važi {days} dana. Ne gubite vreme!

trans-unit.source: This item is once again in-stock.
trans-unit.target: Ova stavka je ponovo u ponudi.

trans-unit.source: You can access the product page by clicking on the link:
trans-unit.target: Možete pristupiti stranici proizvoda klikom na link:

trans-unit.source: You can order it right now from our online shop.
trans-unit.target: Možete naručiti odmah iz naše onlajn prodavnice.

trans-unit.source: Your referred friend {sponsored_firstname} {sponsored_lastname} has placed his or her first order on {shop_name}!
trans-unit.target: Preporučili ste prijatelju {sponsored_firstname}{sponsored_lastname} da postavi svoju prvu porudžbinu na {shop_name}!

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to offer you a voucher worth {discount_display} (voucher # {discount_name}) that you can use on your next order.
trans-unit.target: Zadovoljstvo nam je da ti ponudimo vaučer vredan {discount_display} (vaučer broj # {discount_name}) koji možeš iskoristiti u sledećoj narudžbini.

trans-unit.source: The stock cover is now less than the specified minimum of:
trans-unit.target: Pokrivenost zalihama je manja od određenog minimuma:

trans-unit.source: Your friend {firstname} {lastname} wants to refer you on {shop_name}!
trans-unit.target: Vaš prijatelj {firstname} {lastname} želi da vas preporuči na {shop_name}!

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to offer you a voucher worth {discount} that you can use on your next order.
trans-unit.target: Zadovoljstvo nam je da vam ponudimo vaučer vredan {discount} koji možete iskoristiti u sledećoj narudžbini.

trans-unit.source: Get referred and earn a discount voucher of {discount}!
trans-unit.target: Budi preporučen i zaradi vaučer sa popustom od {discount}%!

trans-unit.source: It's very easy to sign up. Just click here!
trans-unit.target: Prijavljivanje je veoma jednostavno. Samo kliknite ovde!

trans-unit.source: When signing up, don't forget to provide the e-mail address of your referring friend:
trans-unit.target: Pri prijavljivanju, ne zaboravite da obezbedite mejl adresu prijatelja koji vas je preporučio:

trans-unit.source: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter, please confirm your request by clicking the link below :
trans-unit.target: Hvala vam za prijavljivanje na naš bilten, potvrdite vaš upit klikom na link ispod :

trans-unit.source: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter.
trans-unit.target: Zahvaljujemo vam na prijavi za novosti.
